 2008-04622008-02-28,  ,  ,  FAIT, 
ActInternational Centre for Human Rights and Democratic Development Act
PrecisAppointment of PAYAM AKHAVAN of Westmount, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the International Centre for Human Rights and Democratic Development, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
